title: Teen shot to death on Moncrief street identified
content:
JACKSONVILLE, Fla. - The Jacksonville Sheriff's Office has identified a teenager killed in a double shooting last week in the Moncrief neighborhood.
Police said 16-year-old Michael Johnson was shot and killed on Lantana Avenue around 10 p.m. July 20.
A second person was also shot and taken to UF Health Jacksonville in critical condition. Police did not release that person's name or give an update on their condition.
Anyone with any information about this homicide is asked to contact the Jacksonville Sheriff's Office at 904-630-0500 or email them at JSOCrimeTips@jaxsheriff.org. To remain anonymous and receive a possible reward up to $3,000 contact Crime Stoppers at 1-866-845-TIPS.
